question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. tv
B. laptop on couch
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The TV is on a low media console in the foreground, while the laptop on the couch is on a couch that is further back and partially obscured by the coffee table, making the TV clearly closer to the camera.
